items.sentence: What exactly was your relationship with Tom?
Tom said he didn\'t really know what to buy.
Tom said he didn\'t really know where to go.
Tom said he didn\'t sleep much Monday night.
I\'m living in a small house on Park Street.
I\'ve never been asked that question before.
I\'ve never heard Tom sing in public before.
I\'ve never seen Tom behave this way before.
I won\'t be playing tennis with Tom anymore.
I won\'t do what Tom said he wants me to do.
This guidebook might be useful on your trip.
The bus came to a stop and everyone got off.
I wish we didn\'t have to move to Australia.
I don\'t think you want to take that chance.
I don\'t understand what just happened here.
I\'ve kind of gotten used to the conditions.
Tom is never in his office in the afternoon.
Tom is now old enough to do that on his own.
Tom didn\'t get out of bed until after noon.
Tom didn\'t give me a chance to talk to him.
